taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species redundans;

treatment.other_name: (superfluous or redundant; because originally illustrated as no.32, the author changing his mind)
treatment.description: Resembling no. 36; with more strongly armed canes, the strong prickles 3 or 4 min. long; primocane-leaves 5-foliolate, promptly glabrate above; terminal leaflet ovate, two-thirds as broad as long, median leaflets more elliptic.
